sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const About = () => { return (

About Me

Drive is arguably the most important factor when it comes to a successful professional life. Mine is innovation. How can we utilize the resources, knowledge and skill we have to create something inestimable in value?

Hi everyone! I'm Kapil Mulay, student by day, guitarist & entrepreneur by night. I learnt development and coding as a way to progress on my own startup. As I dug deeper, I found myself getting more and more interested in the fields, leading me to the fascinating world of emerging technologies.

I'm still exploring my interests, what sorts of projects I enjoy working on and what kinds of problems I enjoy solving the most. Meanwhile I have made it a mission to learn all about the fields that fascinate me, including Edge Computing, Web3, IoT, Web Design Psychology and more, all the time working on projects related to these.

Moving forward, I'm excited to learn more about the professional world, and to work with like-minded peers on mutually fascinating projects. Feel free to reach out at kapil.mulay@protonmail.com to connect!

) } export default About
